articles.title: Burial site with 445 bodies outside Izyum shows evidence of war crimes, Ukraine says - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: Hundreds of bodies discovered in the newly liberated Kharkiv region would represent the biggest unmarked grave in Europe since the aftermath of the Balkan wars of the 1990s
articles.content: Most of the graves outside Izyum, which could represent the largest mass burial discovered in Europe since the Balkan wars of the 1990s ,were marked only with a simple cross and a number.Anton Skyba/… [+7571 chars]

articles.title: Uefa set to allow Chelsea vs Liverpool and Man Utd vs Leeds to clash with Champions League - iNews
articles.description: Domestic games are not usually allowed to clash with Uefa fixtures but with such a busy season already scheduled, i understands the European governing body are 'open' to relaxing their usual rules
articles.content:
Uefa is open to the Premier League scheduling matches on European nights to help tackle the growing fixture crisis.

articles.title: China Loses $11B Philipines Deal; Korean, European Firms Win Contract To Develop A Strategic Airport In ASEAN Nation - EurAsian Times
articles.description: A consortium composed of Philippine, European, and South Korean companies has secured a contract for $11 billion airport project in the Philippines that was previously eyed by China, the group announced on September 15.
